name: InerSex
overview: Better than one would expect from a breakout clone with erotic pictures in the background. It's playable. The music is catchy. The curved border of the playfield gives it a distinctive look. With a release date during an era when the Internet and erotic content weren't as ubiquitous as they are today and with a sales price limited to 4 US-Dollars by the developers, this wasn't a bad product.
